name: Banded Ankle Inversions
notes: Restore active range with low-load movement

name: Single-Leg Balance on Foam Pad
notes: GPP: Rebuild basic ankle stability → SPP: Advance to dynamic balance under fatigue

name: Towel Scrunches (Toe Curls)
notes: GPP: Activate toe flexors and arch → SPP: Add resistance or longer holds for strength

name: Double-Leg Pogo Jumps
notes: SPP: Rebuild spring through toe-off → TAPER: Maintain stiffness without fatigue

name: Short Foot Doming
notes: GPP: Relearn foot activation → SPP: Apply to single-leg or loaded stances

name: Knee-Locked Calf Stretch
notes: GPP: Reduce fascia tightness → SPP: Maintain range under load → TAPER: Keep mobility without CNS stress

name: Heel Taps on Soft Mat
notes: GPP: Reintroduce heel contact and tolerance

name: Toe-Elevated Calf Raises
notes: SPP: Build fascia strength with loaded stretch

name: Wall Calf Stretch (Straight Leg)
notes: TAPER: Flush tension and swelling without load

name: Single-Leg RDL with Reach
notes: SPP: Test control under movement → TAPER: Maintain balance skill under deload

name: Toe Spreading with Resistance Band
notes: GPP: Restore mid-foot mobility → TAPER: Maintain range before comp

name: Foot Massage with Lacrosse Ball
notes: TAPER: Reduce DOMS and keep blood flow in taper week

name: Banded Ankle Distraction
notes: GPP: Open anterior joint space → SPP: Maintain pain-free dorsiflexion under load

name: Loaded Dorsiflexion Rocks (Barbell Front Foot)
notes: SPP: Build loaded range into ankle → TAPER: Preserve joint glide under low fatigue

name: Elevated Ankle Pumps
notes: TAPER: Pump fluid and reduce ankle pressure

name: Toe CARs (Controlled Articular Rotations)
notes: GPP: Restore capsule control → TAPER: Maintain joint health pre-fight

name: Isometric Big Toe Press into Ground
notes: SPP: Tolerate load without movement → TAPER: Sustain tension with no added strain

name: Toe Towel Slides (Loaded Variant)
notes: GPP: Restore toe flexor range → SPP: Add resistance and control

name: Toe Extensor Stretch (Wall Dorsiflex)
notes: TAPER: Downregulate tension across toe and dorsal foot

name: Lateral Hop-Stick Drill
notes: SPP: Develop reactive ankle control → TAPER: Sharpen footwork under deload

name: Resisted Toe Pulls with Band
notes: GPP: Isolate toe flexors → SPP: Integrate into push-off strength
